author: USA TODAY, Patrick Ryan, USA TODAY
title: Mindy Kaling has 'newfound respect for stay-at-home moms' while quarantining with her toddler
description: Mindy Kaling says she gets to "redo my maternity leave" while self-isolating with her two-year-old daughter, Kit, during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
John Krasinski launched a new YouTube channel dedicated to discussing good news, and his first guest was "The Office" co-star Steve Carell.
USA TODAY
Mindy Kaling is adjusting just fine to life in quarantine. 
In fact, she's thriving. When we call her up t… [+3886 chars]
